name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dedicated Field Engineer with expertise in diagnosing hardware issues and offering hardware break-fix solutions, I am skilled in adhering to security protocols and compliance requirements. Leveraging **CompTIA A+** and **Network+** certifications, I excel in problem-solving and communication, ensuring client satisfaction and technical support. My 8+ years of experience as a Senior Python Full Stack Developer has equipped me with a robust technical foundation, proficient in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy), **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, **Next.js**, and adept at working with **AWS** and **Azure** cloud platforms. I bring a strong background in database optimization with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, focusing on building high-performance, secure applications tailored to various industries including e-commerce, finance, and healthcare.
